post.body: - And I am sooooo okay with mine...lol! These challenges are going to be sooooo much fun!
- Night! I am still organizing my reader. :)
- Now that it's off the air, I will. Too many of my reading friends are loving it. And I did love the show! ;)
- I watched the show first and then couldn't get into reading the books. I think enough time has passed for me to do so.
- OH WOW! A dream job!! Love it.
- Oh good! I had to leave quickly and didn't know if you were back. All ok?
- Mun's book wasn't mediocre, at least not to me. Too many pluses to be called that. My big gripe was that ending.
- Nah, snow melts fast in the south.
- I've had no choice but to switch. I needed a cleaner looking reader. I'll do a write up in a few.
- Ours is just about gone. ;)
- You know you can make it a single column...but I guess compared to the others, it's still big.
- I am starting on The Dresden Files in 2009! Did you watch the show?
- I hate when the box to my audios are dented. :( I also get upset if I have a tear in my book's cover. Shipping's rough on books!
- I can't seem to get the hang of it. :(
- Night! :)
- Funny you should mention that. I am eating Pita Garlic Chips.
- Some of those photos are neat. ;)
- OH! Well, then I would yell before sitting down, "Incoming!" I'm so cruel...lol!
- you and pup can't cuddle?
- We're a bit cooler at 59 degrees.
- That is a really neat point. Something to put down as a goal for 2009.
- Love it!
- Just joined! Great idea!!
- I have it on my wish list. :)
- How are you liking it here?
- Yeah, but I bet we'd need to stay off Twitter more. :( Read less...actually work. Eek!
- LOL! Merry Christmas to you too! :)
- Merry Christmas to you too! :)
- Merry Christmas! :)
- it's 71 degrees, so around here it doesn't even feel like winter.
- So those photos on your blog were only a small portion of books, right?
- I have Nona's reviews to post after that. Guess what I'll be doing on Christmas...lol!
Night all...done with all I am going to do tonight! See you all tomorrow. :)
Hey Sayuri! I look forward to getting to know you through Twitter. :) Visited your blog. Are you signed up for the Harlequin Challenge?
